name: full-stack-challenge
description: Producer/Consumer system where producer generates a random equation for consumer to solve.

CONSUMER_ADDRESS.description: The address to the publicly facing Consumer. Should include 'http://', but not the 'port'. Typically this will just be the public URL to the Heroku instance you're creating right now. For example: 'http://my-app-name.herokuapp.com'

CONSUMER_PORT.description: The port that the Consumer is listening on. Most likely port 80.

PRODUCER_LOW.description: The lowest integer possible to randomly generate by a Producer.

PRODUCER_HIGH.description: The highest integer possible to randomly generate by a Producer.

PRODUCER_INTERVAL.description: The interval in milliseconds for which the Producer should generate and pass expressions to the Consumer.
